title: Font on this Album Cover
content:
could you please help me identify the font theyre using for the album title? thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820015538im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BPLkNz7CEAA5I5Q_4759.jpg)
author: mamalumimin

comments.content:
Hello  
Please check:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Luxembourg.font?text=hartTo](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820015538/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Luxembourg.font?text=hartTo "http://www.whatfontis.com/Luxembourg.font?text=hartTo")  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820015538/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!
